title: New Featured Game Mode Idea?
body: Has Riot ever entertained the idea of having a featured game mode where summoner's Rift is the older version? I think that having the older maps (including the old design of the minions and neutral monsters) would be something that people who have played since the beginning of playing League of Legends and those that have played only on the most recent map would enjoy seeing the map (again).

replies.body: Oooooo that'd be fun! I wonder what some of the newer summoner's would think of the old jungle xD!
please no blue sentinel with lisnars (yes thats intentional)
